text: Wafāt/wafāh sì túmọ̀ sí ""ƙọbd"" gbígba ẹnì kan kúrò lọ́wọ́ ẹnì kan nínú sūrah āli ‘Imrọ̄n 3:55 ati sūrah al-Mọ̄’dah ẹlẹ́sìn ’Islām ni àwọn t’ó tẹ̀lé ‘Īsā ọmọ Mọryam ('alaehi-ssọlātu wa-ssalām). Àti ‘Īsā ọmọ Mọryam ('alaehi-ssọlātu wa-ssalām) àti ọ̀wọ́ àwọn t’ó tẹ̀lé e lójú ayé rẹ̀ mùsùlùmí ni wọ́n gẹ́gẹ́ bí wọ́n ṣe pera wọn bẹ́ẹ̀ nínú sūrah yìí
